metadata.synopsis: Plays when she spots no prisoners in the cell.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Part of the Warden`s behaviours. Will play when she spots an empty cell.

0.speaker: The Warden
0.context: NodeContext: frantic, looking through the bars, panicked

1.speaker: The Warden
1.text: I'll be flayed alive for this.
1.context: NodeContext: the usually intimidating warden is terrified for herself - knows her fate for letting the prisoners escpae
